name: Document Topic Extraction
description: Extract the most important and relevant topics and themes from a document.

appStages.name: Introduction
Keyword Extraction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eDocument Topic Extraction\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Select and upload the PDF document you wish to extract topics from. Press \u0027Execute\u0027 to start the extraction process. A concise list of topics will be generated in the response text area below.\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload a File",
      "description": "Upload any PDF document",
      "customClass": "icon- transparent m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "1KB",
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [

                                      "tableView": false,
                                      "key": "Upload",

                                        "for": "file",
                                        "clearFiles": "true",
                                        "dirOverwrite": "true"

                                      "logic": [
                                        {
                                          "name": "Enable Button",
                                          "trigger": {
                                            "type": "javascript",
                                            "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027file\u0027].length);"

                                              "state": false

                                      ],
